item.name: questions

body.raw:
{
    "topic": "Days of the Week",
    "unit": "Introduction to English",
    "content": "What is the third day of the week?",
    "correctAnswers": ["Wednesday"],
    "misleadingAnswers": ["Monday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", "Sunday"],
    "questionType": "pick",
    "difficulty": 2
}

response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "answeredQuestions": [
            {
                "question_id": 2,
                "content": "In what situation is it appropriate to say \"Nice to meet you\"?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "Introducing yourself."
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Asking for directions.",
                    "Saying goodbye."
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": true
            },
            {
                "question_id": 3,
                "content": "How do you greet someone in the evening?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "Good evening."
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Good night.",
                    "Good afternoon.",
                    "Good day."
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": true
            },
            {
                "question_id": 5,
                "content": "What do you say before going to sleep?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "Good night."
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Good morning.",
                    "Good afternoon.",
                    "Good day."
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": true
            },
            {
                "question_id": 6,
                "content": "What is a polite way to ask about someone's name?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "What is your name?",
                    "May I ask your name?"
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Who are you?",
                    "What is this?"
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": true
            },
            {
                "question_id": 7,
                "content": "Which question can be used to ask about someone about their interests or hobbies?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "What do you do for fun?"
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "How are you?",
                    "What is your name?",
                    "Do you like me?"
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": true
            }
        ],
        "unansweredQuestions": [
            {
                "question_id": 1,
                "content": "Which of the following is a common response to the greeting \"How are you?\"",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "I have been better.",
                    "Fine, thank you."
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Goodbye!",
                    "Nice to meet you.",
                    "See you later!"
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": false
            },
            {
                "question_id": 4,
                "content": "In a formal email, what is a suitable greeting to use when you don't know the recipient's name?",
                "correct_answers": [
                    "Dear Sir/Madam,"
                ],
                "misleading_answers": [
                    "Hey!",
                    "Hi there!",
                    "See you soon."
                ],
                "question_type": "pick",
                "difficulty": 1,
                "is_answered": false
            }
        ]
    }
}
